statements: SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_companies;
SELECT company_name, certifications FROM ewaste_recycling_companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM ewaste_recycling_companies;
SELECT certifications, services FROM ewaste_recycling_companies;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_companies WHERE company_name = 'Green Electronics Recycling';
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, services FROM ewaste_recycling_companies WHERE certifications like '%ISO%' AND services IS NOT NULL ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_companies, certifications FROM ewaste_recycling_companies GROUP BY certifications HAVING total_companies > 2;
SELECT company_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM ewaste_recycling_companies WHERE certifications = 'R2' OR certifications = 'e-Stewards' ORDER BY company_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT DISTINCT certifications, COUNT(*) AS total_companies FROM ewaste_recycling_companies GROUP BY certifications HAVING total_companies > 1 ORDER BY total_companies DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT company_name, services, certifications FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_name = 'Green Recycling Inc';
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_phone FROM recycling_companies WHERE certifications LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, certifications FROM recycling_companies WHERE certifications LIKE '%ISO%' ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL AND contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT company_name, LENGTH(services) AS service_length FROM recycling_companies WHERE services IS NOT NULL ORDER BY service_length DESC;
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_email FROM recycling_companies WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY company_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name, certifications FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_name = 'Green Planet Recycling';
SELECT company_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT rc.company_name, rs.service_name, rs.description FROM recycling_companies rc JOIN recycling_services rs ON rc.company_id = rs.company_id;
SELECT cc.certification_name, cc.issue_date, cc.expiry_date, rc.company_name FROM company_certifications cc JOIN recycling_companies rc ON cc.company_id = rc.company_id;
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_email FROM recycling_companies WHERE contact_person = 'John Smith';
SELECT company_name, certification_name, issue_date FROM recycling_companies JOIN company_certifications ON recycling_companies.company_id = company_certifications.company_id;
SELECT company_name, services FROM recycling_companies WHERE certifications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT company_name, service_name FROM recycling_companies JOIN recycling_services ON recycling_companies.company_id = recycling_services.company_id;
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT company_name, service_type, certification_status FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE issued_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, service_name, service_description FROM recycling_companies JOIN services ON recycling_companies.company_id = services.company_id;
SELECT company_name, certification_name, expiration_date FROM recycling_companies JOIN certifications ON recycling_companies.company_id = certifications.company_id;
SELECT company_name, service_type FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contact_details WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT c.company_name, s.service_name, c.certification_status FROM recycling_companies c JOIN services s ON c.company_id = s.company_id;
SELECT MAX(issued_date) AS latest_certification_date FROM certifications;
SELECT company_name, services FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM recycling_services WHERE company_id = 'c6b384b2-50b2-4ad6-9a41-6d4c49a64a79';
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization, valid_until FROM certifications ORDER BY valid_until DESC;
SELECT contact_person_name, contact_phone, contact_email FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_id = '7a300f82-8183-4fd3-a6ce-e505a1aa099b';
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person_name, contact_phone FROM disposal_locations WHERE company_id = 'dc0d424f-6f6d-49d6-a306-864e371382be';
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT company_name, contact_person_name, contact_phone FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_name LIKE '%Recycle%'
SELECT r.*, c.certification_name FROM recycling_companies r JOIN certifications c ON r.company_id = c.company_id ORDER BY r.company_name
SELECT DISTINCT services[1] AS popular_service FROM recycling_companies WHERE certifications @> ARRAY['ISO 14001']
SELECT d.location_name, d.address, c.company_name FROM disposal_locations d JOIN recycling_companies c ON d.company_id = c.company_id WHERE c.contact_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.company_name
